attributes.action: add a health warning on non organic foodstuff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have health warnings on cigarette packets but why can't we have health warnings on food that is contaminated by chemicals that are not only damaging to our health but are also damaging to the environment.
This would allow people to make informed choices about the effects of harmful chemicals in their food supplies.

If food is not organically grown then the public have a right to know about the dangers of toxic chemicals and the effects it could have for them and their children.

At least then consumers are given a clear choice and the producers would eventually change their ways and go chemical free!
